data.name: Space Shells
data.detailed_description:
Space Shells is a rogue-lite sci-fi VR game with stunning graphics where you have to break into spaceships and make clever use of your shells to complete the tasks.

Randomly generated missions!
Each life is a new character, mission and location of enemies in spaceships!

Choose your difficulty!
You are able to choose the difficulty of a mission from trivially to nightmarishly hard.

Reveal secrets of the trans-galaxy corporation!
Every mission gets you closer to unlocking new weapons and shells to play.

Break into spaceships!
Crush your enemies to pieces with an arsenal of weapons or your bare fists.
Upgrade your weapons and shells to make your character much more dangerous and stronger.

Be careful!
If you blow up some modules of a ship with grenades, fuel barrels or random shoot you will start a new life from the beginning.

Immersive gameplay with a generated story shaped by your choices and skills will make you feel like a hero of a real space adventure.

Stunning graphics powered by Unreal Engine.

Let the space journey begin!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5-4590 or greater
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
